summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 HONDA ACCORD. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE REVERSING OUT OF THE DRIVEWAY AT 2-3 MPH, THE REAR VIEW CAMERA BECAME INOPERABLE. THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO HUNTINGTON HONDA (1055 E JERICHO TURNPIKE, HUNTINGTON, NY 11743) WHERE THE DEALER INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT IT WAS PROBABLY A SHORT CIRCUIT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE CONTACT INFORMED THE MANUFACTURER OF THE FAILURE, AND THE MANUFACTURER OPENED A CASE FOR THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 20V440000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM, BACK OVER PREVENTION) AND NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 20V439000 (BACK OVER PREVENTION, ELECTRICAL SYSTEM ) HOWEVER, THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 36,300.
